Oludotun Baiyewu Jacobs, (onye a mụrụ 11 July 1942), amara site n'ezi ngosipụta àgwà dị ka Olu Jacobs, bụ Omee nke Nigeria na ezekutiv fiim
O meela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri onyonyo nke telivishọn Britain na ụfọdụ ihe nkiri mba ofesi

Ọtụtụ ndị etoola Olu Jacobs dịka otu n'ime ndị na -eme ihe nkiri Afrịka kachasị ukwuu na nke a na -akwanyere ùgwù na ọgbọ ya., tinyere Pete Edochie, ọtụtụ ndị mgbasa ozi, ndị na -akọwa ihe nkiri, ndị nkatọ na ndị na -eme ihe nkiri na -ele ya anya ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị na -eme ihe nkiri Afrịka kacha nwee mmetụta n'oge niile, a na -ewerekwa ya dị ka akara ngosi ọdịbendị
A na -ahụ ya dị ka ókè dị n'etiti ndị na -eme ihe nkiri ochie na ndị ọhụrụ.
Jacobs emeela akara ya na ụlọ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa

N'ime ihe karịrị afọ iri anọ ọ na -eme ihe nkiri, a na -ahụ ya dịka ókè dị n'etiti ụdị ndị na -eme ihe nkiri ochie na ndị ọhụrụ.  A zụrụ ya na Royal Academy of Dramatic Arts, dị na  England, ya na ụlọ ihe nkiri dị iche iche arụkọla ọrụ na Britain ma gosipụtakwa na ụfọdụ ihe nkiri mba ụwa.
N'afọ 2007, o nwetara nturu ugo ihe nkiri 'African Movie Academy Award' maka onye na -eme ihe nkiri kacha mma onye isi oru
Olu Jacobs akọwapụtala onwe ya dị ka nna nna na Nollywood, na -emeghe ụzọ ịga nke ọma nye  ọtụtụ ndị na -eme ihe nkiri na ndị na -eme ihe nkiri na amalite amalite

Mmasị na ịhụnanya ọ nwere  maka ime ihe nkiri sitere na mkpali nke onye na -eme ihe nkiri ama ama laarala mmụọ bụ, Hubert Ogunde na - emume oriri kwa afọ nke emere na Colonial Hotel dị na Kano, emesịa, ọ gawara England ebe ọ gụrụ maka ime ihe nkiri na Royal Academy of Dramatic Arts na London
A kọwara ya dị ka 'otu n'ime ndị na -eme ihe nkiri Nollywood kacha mma, onye ntụgharị okwu kacha mma na onye na -ejikwa okwu kacha mma'

Maka ntunye uchu ọtunyere n'ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ihe karịrị afọ iri ise, a kwanyere ya ugwu site na nturu ugo ụlọ ọrụ nyere ya maka ọ pụrụ iche nke ọ pụrụ abịa n'ihe gbasara ihe ngosi na  Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards nke afọ 2013
Ọzọkwa, AMAA nyere ya ihe nrite nturu ugo gụrụ gawa na ndụ ya na 2016.
Olu Jacobs lụrụ nwanyị na -eme ihe nkiri bụ Joke Silva
Di na nwunye ahụ hiwere ma nwee ụlọ ọrụ Lufodo Group, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke mejupụtara mmepụta ihe nkiri, akụ nkesa na  ụlọ akwụkwọ Lufodo ebe ana akuzi gbasara emume ihe nkiri
Oludotun Baiyewu Jacobs bụ onye amụụrụ nne na nna si Egba Alake
Ọ nọrọ ndụ nwata ya na Kano  wee gaa Holy Trinity School ebe ọ bụ onye otu arụmụka na ihe nkiri
A kpaliri ya ka o were ohere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ gara otu oriri egwu Chief Hubert Ogunde kwa afọ na Colonial Hotel dị na Kano
N'ikpeazụ, o nwetara visa wee gaa England ka ọ gụọ gbasara ihe nkiri.
Na England, Jacobs bụ onye azụrụ  na Royal Academy of Dramatic Arts na London
Ọ pụtara na ihe ngosi telivishọn Britain dị iche iche na usoro n'afọ 1970 (gụnyere The Goodies, Till Death Do Us  Part, Barlow at Large, The Venturers, Angels, 1990, Ndị Echi na Ndị Ọkachamara )
Na 1978, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ngosipụta àgwà  nke Onye isi ala Mageeba na ihe ngosi Michael Codron nke egwu Sir Tom Stoppard Night na Day

N'ime afọ 1980 gawazie Jacobs pụtara na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri mba ofesi, gụnyere ihe nkiri John Irvin The Dogs of War, Roman Polanski 's adventure-comedy Pirates (1986) na ihe nkiri ezinụlọ Baby: Secret of the Legend Lost (1985)
Na telivishọn, ọ bụ onye otu emume na TVS ' The Witches and the Grinnygog
Jacobs emechaala gosipụta ihe nkiri Nollywood karịrị otu narị na iri abụọ
A na -ahụta ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na -eme ihe nkiri Nollywood nke Naịjirịa
Jacobs lụrụ onye na -eme ihe nkiri Nollywood Joke Silva kemgbe 1989
Ha nwere ụmụ
Mgbe a jụrụ ya ihe kpatara na nwunye ya ka na -aza aha nwa agbọghọ ya, Jacobs zara, sị: “Ọ bụ onwe nke aka ya
Mgbe m zutere ya, ọ bụ onye na -eme ihe nkiri a maara dị ka Joke Silva yabụ kedu ihe kpatara ịlụ m ga -eji gọnarị ya na ndị na -ege ya ntị aha ya
Ọ bụ Miss Joke Silva onye bụ Oriakụ
Joke Jacobs
Ọ dị mfe dị ka nke ahụ
Ndị mmadụ na -amalitezi ikwu ihe masịrị ha
Ha ededịla na anyị kewapụrụ onwe anyị na ụdị ihe niile
Mgbe ọ na -arụ ọrụ, ọ bụ Joke Silva mana ọ bụ Oriakụ
Joke Jacobs n'ụlọ
Olu Jacobs nwetara ihe nrite ụlọ ọrụ maka ihe ịga nke ọma ha na -eme na 2013 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards
